ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: An occurrence of MSH-21 (Message Profile Identifier) SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.71' (eDOS_NG_Profile) or two occurrences SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.67' (eDOS_Common_Component) and '2.16.840.1.113883.9.69' (eDOS_NG_Component) in any order.

Assertion.Description: Failed Assertion: No detailed assertion information is available

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: MSH-1 (Field Separator) SHALL contain the constant value '|'.
MSH-2 (Encoding Characters) SHALL contain the constant value '^~\&' or the constant value '^~\&#'.

Predicate.EnglishDescription: If HD_NG.2 (Universal ID) is not valued.
If HD_NG.1 (Namespace ID) is not valued.
If HD_NG.2 (Universal ID) is not valued.
If HD_NG.1 (Namespace ID) is not valued.
If HD_NG.2 (Universal ID) is not valued.
If HD_NG.1 (Namespace ID) is not valued.

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: TS_1 SHALL be precise to the second.
MSH-12.1 (Version ID) SHALL contain the constant value '2.5.1'.
VID.1 (Version Identifier) SHALL be valued with '2.5.1'.
EI_GU.3 (Universal ID) SHALL be valued with an ISO-compliant OID.

Assertion.Description: Failed Assertion : EI_GU.3 format is an ISO-compliant OID

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: EI_GU.4 (Universal ID Type) SHALL contain the value 'ISO'.

Field.Name: Software Certified Version or Release Number

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: If MSH-9.2 (Message Type^Trigger Event) is valued 'M10' then MFI-1.1 (Identifier) SHALL be valued 'OMC'.
If MSH-9.2 (Message Type^Trigger Event) is valued 'M08' then MFI-1.1 (Identifier) SHALL be valued 'OMA'.
If MSH-9.2 (Message Type^Trigger Event) is valued 'M04' then MFI-1.1 (Identifier) SHALL be valued 'CDM'.

Predicate.EnglishDescription: If CWE.3 (Name Of Coding System) is valued.
If CWE.6 (Name Of Alternate Coding System) is valued.

Component.Name: Second Name of Alternate Coding System
Second Alternate Coding System Version ID
Second Alternate Value Set Version ID

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: MFI-6 (Response Level Code) SHALL be valued 'NE'.

Predicate.EnglishDescription: If MFI-6 Response Level Code is any value other than 'NE'.

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: TS_1 SHALL be precise to the second.

Predicate.EnglishDescription: If CWE_RC.3 (Name Of Coding System) is valued.

Component.Name: Second Name of Alternate Coding System
Second Alternate Coding System Version ID
Second Alternate Value Set Version ID

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: MFE-5 (Primary Key Value Type) SHALL be valued 'CWE'.
CDM-1 (Primary Key Value - CDM) SHALL match MFE-4 (Primary Key Value - MFE)

Predicate.EnglishDescription: If CWE_RC.3 (Name Of Coding System) is valued.

Second Alternate Coding System Version ID
